card.name: Sosuke's Summons
card.property: Create two 1/1 green Snake creature tokens. Whenever a nontoken Snake you control enters, you may return Sosuke's Summons from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Splinter
card.property: Exile target artifact. Search its controller's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as that artifact and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

card.name: Traproot Kami
card.property: Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Traproot Kami's toughness is equal to the number of Forests on the battlefield.

card.name: Unchecked Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn. If it's a Spirit, it gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Uproot
card.property: Put target land on top of its owner's library.

card.name: Vital Surge
card.property: You gain 3 life. Splice onto Arcane {1}{G} (As you cast an Arcane spell, you may reveal this card from your hand and pay its splice cost. If you do, add this card's effects to that spell.)

card.name: Genju of the Realm

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Enchant land {2}: Enchanted land becomes a legendary 8/12 Spirit creature with trample until end of turn. It's still a land. When enchanted land is put into a graveyard, you may return Genju of the Realm from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Baku Altar
card.property: Whenever you cast a Spirit or Arcane spell, you may put a ki counter on Baku Altar. {2}, {T}, Remove a ki counter from Baku Altar: Create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Blinding Powder
card.property: Equipped creature has "Unattach Blinding Powder: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to this creature this turn." Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mirror Gallery
card.property: The "legend rule" doesn't apply.

card.name: Neko-Te
Orb of Dreams
card.property: Permanents enter tapped.

card.name: Ornate Kanzashi
card.property: {2}, {T}: Target opponent exiles the top card of their library. You may play that card this turn.

card.name: Ronin Warclub
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+1. Whenever a creature you control enters, attach Ronin Warclub to that creature. Equip {5} ({5}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shuko
card.property: Equipped creature gets +1/+0. Equip {0} ({0}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Shuriken
card.property: Equipped creature has "{T}, Unattach Shuriken: Shuriken deals 2 damage to target creature. That creature's controller gains control of Shuriken unless it was unattached from a Ninja." Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Slumbering Tora
card.property: {2}, Discard a Spirit or Arcane card: Slumbering Tora becomes an X/X Cat artifact creature until end of turn, where X is the discarded card's mana value.

card.name: That Which Was Taken
card.property: {4}, {T}: Put a divinity counter on target permanent other than That Which Was Taken. Each permanent with a divinity counter on it has indestructible.

card.name: Umezawa's Jitte
card.property: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage, put two charge counters on Umezawa's Jitte. Remove a charge counter from Umezawa's Jitte: Choose one — • Equipped creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. • Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn. • You gain 2 life. Equip {2}

card.name: Gods' Eye, Gate to the Reikai
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. When Gods' Eye, Gate to the Reikai is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, create a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Tendo Ice Bridge
card.property: Tendo Ice Bridge enters with a charge counter on it. {T}: Add {C}. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Tendo Ice Bridge: Add one mana of any color.
